aligned: Upon a successful spellcast, you may Replenish one resource type.
goal1: cast a spell to take over someone's replenishment roll
goal2: lead all four seasons at some point

ability: when you gather resources, subtract one less pip from the resource tile while keeping the amount you gather
aligned: (Replaces ability) After gathering, roll 1d4 and replenish that resource tile.

ability: full refund of final layer upon completion
unaligned: Upon visiting a building you do not own, you may additionally take the Owner Visit Bonus.

aligned: You may bargain to take other players' hanging invitations. Deals about this are a form of Trade.
unaligned: Hanging invitations are half the cost to complete.

aligned: All sigil gaining events or purchases are half their cost.
unaligned: Upon entering this alignment, discard down to 1 sigil. Each sigil discarded -> +3i
goal2: win a duel/cast a spell successfully on each player

aligned: +1 wood on all gathers (total +2 wood on forest gather)
unaligned: (Replaces ability) +1 stone or marble on quarry or basin gathers.

ability: +1 resource added to populate rolls (maximum remains unchanged)
aligned: You may pay 1 resource to reroll a population dice. You must keep the result. This can populate empty tiles.
unaligned: You may populate and replenish up to 2d6. 2d6 is their new maximum.
goal2: Populate 3 tiles to their maximum (not including season leading)

ability: layers for stone-foundation building cost 1 less stone
aligned: All first layers cost one less stone
unaligned: layers for any foundation cost 1 less stone

ability: Double the influence gained from the last layer of a building.
aligned: You have 0 votes on spells. Overriding votes cost only 1 influence.
goal2: build one of each foundation type

aligned: Take an exploration bonus roll whenever you finish your turn on a resource tile.
unaligned: You may ignore the Exploration Event and instead place a plains.
goal1: find one of each tile type (excluding volcano)
